title: "Exercise 2.4.8"
---

```{r include=FALSE} 
knitr::opts_chunk$set(options(scipen = 999))
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```

> Repeat (Exercise 7)[02_04_07.html] if it takes $3 \cdot 10^{11}$ seconds to examine each key

> (a) the worst-case complexity

Worst case is $n \cdot 3 \cdot 10^{-11}$ seconds

> (b) the average-case complexity

Average case is $\frac{n+1}{2} \cdot 3 \cdot 10^{-11}$ seconds
